body_html: I'm glad it's possible to do what you need to do. I agree our API is imperfect and has room for improvement. We have limited flexibility to make it easier to use, due to our API stability promises and API changes generally require high level approval. If you feel strongly that this should be a feature request, please provide more details on what you'd like to see happen.
body_text: I'm glad it's possible to do what you need to do. I agree our API is imperfect and has room for improvement. We have limited flexibility to make it easier to use, due to our API stability promises and API changes generally require high level approval. If you feel strongly that this should be a feature request, please provide more details on what you'd like to see happen.
body: I'm glad it's *possible* to do what you need to do. I agree our API is imperfect and has room for improvement. We have limited flexibility to make it easier to use, due to our [API stability promises](https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/version_compat) and API changes generally require high level approval. If you feel strongly that this should be a feature request, please provide more details on what you'd like to see happen.
